editor.orgName: University of HamburgFront guard folio- 25 written in pink chalk and in pencil śāṃkarabhāṣya ase is written in Devanagari script in Marathi language.

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This Manuscript seems to be somehow belong to some place in Maharashtra or Maharashtrian scribe or owner as the front folio has a line in Devanagari written in Marathi language. Front guard folio- 25 written in pink chalk and in pencil śāṃkarabhāṣya ase is written in Devanagari script in Marathi language. 186r is blank. The text is continued at 186v.

msItem.title: Brahmasūtrabhāṣya
msItem.author: Nīlakaṇṭha
msItem.incipit: 15v 1 rvedakarttā ya sarvajñayvādinā viśvasmāt cida(lacuna of 2 syllables.) prapañcāt adhiko rudraḥ parabrahmasūtrassarveṣāndevānāmindrādinām prathamamādi
msItem.explicit: 187r 7 he yādṛśānīśvarasya śarī (gap of 2-3 syllables) ni lakṣaṇatādi lakṣaṇāni tādṛśāni tatsādṛśya ?? jāmīti eke pi ? nīlagrīvāśśitikarṇā ityādiṣṭasupa

support.p: thin palm leaf as guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin. Initial 14 folio are missing.
supportDesc.condition: Broken edges and corners. Text is affected due to broken folio.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words, Question mark is used to show illegible letter.

TEI.text:
15v 1 rvedakarttā ya sarvajñayvādinā viśvasmāt cida(lacuna of 2 syllables.) prapañcāt adhiko rudraḥ parabrahmasūtrassarveṣāndevānāmindrādinām prathamamādi
187r 7 he yādṛśānīśvarasya śarī (gap of 2-3 syllables) ni lakṣaṇatādi lakṣaṇāni tādṛśāni tatsādṛśya ?? jāmīti eke pi ? nīlagrīvāśśitikarṇā ityādiṣṭasupa
